description: A young, energetic creature with fur that crackles with static energy. The Blitzhound Pup is a smaller version of the Blitzhound, known for its loyalty and swift movements. Though not as powerful as its adult form, it can still deliver a shocking bite.

traits.name: Static Fur
traits.description: Creatures that touch the Blitzhound Pup or hit it with a melee attack take 1 lightning damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage plus 1 lightning damage.
